intro: Disporum nanchuanense, commonly known as the Nanchuan lily, is a rare flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Melanthiaceae and is characterized by its striking, nodding white flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments, such as mountainous regions. Its leaves are lance-shaped and arranged in a basal rosette, and it produces small, berry-like fruits. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
